name: Metamorph
description: Metamorph is an independent work of basing on "morph".Wandering in the solitude of the forest,eveyone can change freely the original body shape so as to adapt to the environment,or inherit the racial talent in order to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: Intel i7 CPU @ 2.6GHz or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 555 w/ 1GB VRAM or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Ideally, something with Surround capabilities
